resources.string: Bitte folgen Sie dieser Anleitung\n1. eMedID 2. eMedID Group 3.ASP CODE 4. Medican \n5. Requester 6. Subject 7. Patient instructions 8. Frequency 9. When
"Wrong Input. Please exactly follow the Instructions "

User Direction for PillPal
(powered by AI
Scan
In this Segment you are able to open the camera by pressing the "Scan" button to take a picture of your prescription. If you are satisfied with the picture press "OK", otherwise repeat the process. The App then scans your prescription and sends the data to our Servers, where they are processed further. You can see the scanned prescription in the "Prescriptions" tab.
Prescriptions
Your scanned prescriptions are visible here.
Inventory
In this segment you can manage your medication. In order to do this press the "Take Picture" button. The camera will open and you can take a picture of your medication. If you are satisfied with the outcome press "OK", otherwise repeat the process. After you did this, a picture is displayed in the segment and you can add a name and expiry date, to get a good overview on your medication.
Whisper
In this Segment you are able to input your prescription by speech to text. Press "Start Recording" and start to talk. Please follow the instructions given. When you are finished press "Stop Recording" and if you are satisfied with everything press "Save Recording". If you want to record it again press "Reset". Now your recording is sent to our Server. The prescription then is displayed in the Segment and in the "Prescriptions" tab.
Logout
Here you can log out.

If you need more help, feel free to contact us via E-Mail
